summary: A podcast titled 'School Again' explores the phenomenon of youth language, specifically focusing on the word 'czoó' which was voted as the most interesting word in the "Youth Word of the Year" plebiscite. The podcast delves into the meaning and origin of the word, trying to decode whether the 'ó' at the end has a particular significance or is simply an accent.

original_title: The Power of Threes: The Weimar Triangle for Rural Europe
optimized_title: Weimar Triangle Spurs Sustainable Rural Europe

One such moment was a meeting of representatives of different European initiatives for sustainable development organized in the Mazovian countryside. The event, which took place on the first weekend of Advent, combined rural, urban, agricultural and EU perspectives to find a common thread towards a more just and sustainable agri-food system.
summary: A recent meeting in Mazovia, Poland, brought together representatives from various European initiatives to discuss sustainable rural development. The event, known as the Weimar Triangle, aimed to integrate rural, urban, agricultural, and EU perspectives to create a more just and sustainable agri-food system.
